meanings.definition: The fusion of gametes to form a zygote.
meanings.sent1: Syngamies are essential for the creation of new life.
meanings.sent2: During syngamies, the egg and sperm come together to start a new life.
meanings.sent3: The syngamies at the party were so lively, they formed a zygote dance group.
meanings.sent4: The syngamies of love and biology intertwine to create the miracle of life.
meanings.sent5: In the garden of reproduction, syngamies bloom into the flower of zygote.

meanings.definition: The process of sexual reproduction in which two gametes unite to form a zygote.
meanings.sent1: Understanding syngamies helps us grasp the magic of life creation.
meanings.sent2: Syngamies occur when the male and female gametes merge to form a zygote.
meanings.sent3: The syngamies party was a hit, with gametes dancing their way to zygote formation.
meanings.sent4: In the symphony of reproduction, syngamies play the most crucial note.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nature lies in the simplicity of syngamies leading to zygote formation.

meanings.definition: The union of two gametes during fertilization.
meanings.sent1: The syngamies of egg and sperm mark the beginning of new life.
meanings.sent2: Fertilization involves the syngamies of two gametes to form a zygote.
meanings.sent3: The syngamies celebration was a success, with gametes happily uniting.
meanings.sent4: In the dance of reproduction, syngamies waltz gametes into a zygote embrace.
meanings.sent5: The symphony of life starts with the harmonious syngamies of gametes.
